channel.title: motion detection on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in motion detection on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I tried to detect moving objects quickly with OpenCV
item.description: The articles about OpenCV and Raspberry Pi, which I wrote a long time ago, have started to be read by everyone again recently. I think that you are referring to it because it is a keyword related to the recent trends of "deep learning" and "edge computing". When I suddenly think about the scenes where edge computing is used, I feel that I often see cases of motion detection with cameras.
